description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Music Island is a rhythm game where you make your own music as you play. Take the role of a man trapped on an island and use the beat to defeat waves of incoming sea creatures. Features a full story mode and an infinite mode with global leaderboards.
description.short: Music Island is a rhythm game where you make your own music as you play. Take the role of a man trapped on an island and use the beat to defeat waves of incoming sea creatures. Features a full story mode and an infinite mode with global leaderboards.
